Package org.action.project

Class Project

java.lang.Object
org.action.project.Project
public class Project extends Object
This class encapsulates all information related to a BTO project, including project metadata, flat types, pricing, availability, application periods, and the management team responsible for the project. It provides methods for viewing, editing, and filtering project information based on various criteria.

  • Constructor Details

    • Project

      public Project(String projectName, String neighbourhood, String flatType1, int flatCount1, int flatPrice1, String flatType2, int flatCount2, int flatPrice2, LocalDate openingDate, LocalDate closingDate, String managerName, String managerId, int officerSlotCount, String officersList, String officersIDList, String flatType1Bookings, String flatType2Bookings, boolean visible)
      Constructs a new Project with all required details.
      Parameters:
      projectName - The name of the project
      neighbourhood - The location of where the neighbourhood is located
      flatType1 - The type identifier for the first flat category
      flatCount1 - The total number of flats available in the flag1
      flatPrice1 - The price of flats in the flag1
      flatType2 - The type identifier for the flag2
      flatCount2 - The total number of flats available for flag2
      flatPrice2 - The price of flats in the flag2
      openingDate - The date when applications for this project open
      closingDate - The date when applications for this project close
      managerName - The name of the HDB manager responsible for this project
      managerId - The user ID of the HDB manager responsible for this project
      officerSlotCount - The number of officers that can be assigned to this project
      officersList - The list of officers' names assigned to this project as a colon-separated string
      officersIDList - The list of officers' IDs assigned to this project as a colon-separated string
      flatType1Bookings - The list of booking application IDs for flats of the first type as a colon-separated string
      flatType2Bookings - The list of booking application IDs for flats of the second type as a colon-separated string
      visible - Flag indicating whether the project is visible in public listings

      public boolean isVisible()
      Checks if the project is visible in public listings.
      Returns:
      true if the project is visible, false otherwise

    • view

      public String view(String flatsFilter)
      Generates a view of the project with basic information.
      Parameters:
      flatsFilter - Filter to specify which flat types to include in the view
      Returns:
      A formatted string with basic project information

    • viewFull

      public String viewFull(user usr, String flatsFilter, EnquiriesManager enqMan)
      Generates a detailed view of the project including management information and enquiries.
      Parameters:
      usr - The user requesting the view
      flatsFilter - Filter to specify which flat types to include in the view
      enqMan - Enquiries manager to count project-related enquiries
      Returns:
      A formatted string with detailed project information

    • addBooking

      public void addBooking(String appID, String flatType)
      Adds a booking application ID to the appropriate flat type booking list.
      Parameters:
      appID - The application ID to add
      flatType - The flat type for which the booking is being made

    • removeBooking

      public void removeBooking(String appID, String flatType)
      Removes a booking application ID from the appropriate flat type booking list.
      Parameters:
      appID - The application ID to remove
      flatType - The flat type from which the booking is being removed

    • toggle_visibility

      public void toggle_visibility()
      Toggles the visibility of the project in public listings.

    • edit

      public void edit(String projectName, String neighbourhood, String flatType1, int flatCount1, int flatPrice1, String flatType2, int flatCount2, int flatPrice2, String openingDate, String closingDate, int officerSlots)
      Updates the project's details with new values.
      Parameters:
      projectName - New project name (or empty to keep current)
      neighbourhood - New neighborhood (or empty to keep current)
      flatType1 - New flat type 1 identifier (or empty to keep current)
      flatCount1 - New flat count for type 1 (or 0 to keep current)
      flatPrice1 - New flat price for type 1 (or 0 to keep current)
      flatType2 - New flat type 2 identifier (or empty to keep current)
      flatCount2 - New flat count for type 2 (or 0 to keep current)
      flatPrice2 - New flat price for type 2 (or 0 to keep current)
      openingDate - New opening date as string (or empty to keep current)
      closingDate - New closing date as string (or empty to keep current)
      officerSlots - New officer slot count (or 0 to keep current)

    • editOfficerIDList

      public void editOfficerIDList(String officersIDList)
      Updates the list of officers assigned to this project.
      Parameters:
      officersIDList - New list of officer IDs as a colon-separated string

    • editOfficerNameList

      public void editOfficerNameList(String officersList)
      Updates the list of officers assigned to this project.
      Parameters:
      officersList - New list of officer names as a colon-separated string

    • flatAvailability

      public int flatAvailability(String flat_type)
      Checks the availability of a specific flat type in this project.
      Parameters:
      flat_type - The flat type to check availability for
      Returns:
      The number of available units of the specified flat type

    • managerOfficerOf

      public boolean managerOfficerOf(user usr)
      Checks if a user is the manager or an officer of this project.
      Parameters:
      usr - The user to check
      Returns:
      true if the user is the manager or an officer of the project, false otherwise

    • overlapCheck

      public boolean overlapCheck(LocalDate start_date, LocalDate end_date)
      Checks if this project's application period overlaps with another date range.
      Parameters:
      start_date - Start date of the period to check
      end_date - End date of the period to check
      Returns:
      true if there is an overlap, false otherwise

    • filter

      public boolean filter(String name, String nameExact, String neighbourhood, String flat, user usr, boolean date, boolean visible)
      Filters the project based on various criteria.
      Parameters:
      name - Project name contains filter (case-insensitive)
      nameExact - Project name exact match filter (case-insensitive)
      neighbourhood - Neighborhood contains filter (case-insensitive)
      flat - Flat type contains filter (case-insensitive)
      usr - User filter for projects manager/officer with this user (null to skip)
      date - Whether to filter by current date being within application period
      visible - Whether to filter by project visibility
      Returns:
      true if the project matches all applied filters, false otherwise
